name: Truck Drive Fun
description:
We are ready to become the best driver of the truck?
If yes then go ahead!
You will clear various levels safely. You are required to be the best and complete the task?
Your driving skills and accuracy will be tested in practice!
Get in your truck and go!

Features:
12 exciting levels!
Beautiful 3D graphics!
Realistic physics!
unique experience of driving the truck!
nice music!
